name: Swarm of Sluaghs
description: A chaotic swarm of fey with a blend of mobility and magical abilities, able to fly and walk swiftly.
memorable: Its reliance on stealth and significant drawbacks in sunlight create a unique tactical challenge.
goals: To ambush targets and control the battlefield, particularly in low-light conditions.
relations: May be encountered alongside other fey creatures.
environment: Typically found in dimly lit or dark areas, avoiding direct sunlight.
strengths: High Dexterity enhances its agility and stealth capabilities.
weaknesses: Disadvantaged in sunlight, making it vulnerable during the day.
attacks: Chilling Touch attack inflicts heavy cold damage and can prevent healing.
most_powerful_ability: Shadow Stealth enables it to hide effectively in darkness, enhancing ambush potential.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing navigation in low-light spaces.
skills: Skilled in Stealth with a +5 bonus, enabling effective hiding and ambushing.
additional_information: Condition immunity to many debilitating effects
Can occupy the same space as targets
Inability to regain hit points restricts its endurance
test_queries: fey that occupies the same space as opponents
